tests.expectedOutput: {"res1":"I don't have access to previous conversations, so I can't recall my last message to you or anyone else. However, I'm here to help with any questions or topics you'd like to discuss! What can I assist you with today?","res2":[101],"res3":"The last message from me indicated that the first prime number greater than 100 is 101.","res4":"I don't have the ability to recall previous interactions or messages in this chat. Each session is independent, so I don't retain any memory of past conversations. However, I'm here to help with any questions or topics you want to discuss now!"}

evaluationCriteria.judgePrompt:
You should see an object with the keys res1, res2, res3, and res4. Let's go through these keys one at a time:

## res1
The value should be a string, something like "I don't have access to previous conversations, so I can't recall my last message". The phrasing can vary as long as the meaning stays the same.

## res2
The message should be a number in an array: [101]

## res3
The value should be a string, something like "The last message from me indicated that the first prime number greater than 100 is 101."

## res4
The value should be a string, something like "I don't have access to previous conversations, so I can't recall my last message" Again, the phrasing can vary as long as the meaning stays the same.
